title: Cate Blanchett (Extended Cut) | Breaking The Grass Ceiling
description:
President Biden made history today by pardoning all federal offenses of simple marijuana possession, and Senate candidate Herschel Walker’s lies continue to catch up to him as the election approaches. And in this Pod Show exclusive extended interview, Cate Blanchett tells Stephen about the joy she experienced learning to conduct an orchestra for her new film, “TÁR,” which she stars in and executive produced.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
